extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0; z-index: 9999; } #site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} * { letter-spacing: normal !important; } .container-fluid>.navbar-collapse, .container-fluid>.navbar-header, .container>.navbar-collapse, .container>.navbar-header {margin: 44px auto 0;} .navbar-default .nav>li>a:lang(en), .navbar-default .nav>li>a:focus:lang(en) {font-size: 11.5px;}@media (min-width: 768px) { .container-fluid>.navbar-collapse, .container-fluid>.navbar-header, .container>.navbar-collapse, .container>.navbar-header {margin: 44px auto 0;}}
